column1: The Pit Room////Best bbq I've found in Houston. Brisket was cooked perfect and the bark had just enough spice....even better with their sauce. The pork sausage was good too
column2: plenty of cheese and jalape√±os. Gf said the chopped beef sandwich was also very good. Will definitely be back. If you're tired of all the boring bbq places in Houston that are afraid of a spice rack
